text: ai logon apane paalane vaale se daro jisane tum sabako (sirph) ek shakhs se paida kiya aur (vah is tarah ki pahale) unakee baakee mittee se unakee beevee (havva) ko paida kiya aur (sirf) unheen do (miyo beevee) se bahut se mard aur auraten duniya mein phaila diye aur us khuda se daro jisake vaseele se aapas mein ek doosare se savaal karate ho aur qate raham se bhee daro beshak khuda tumhaaree dekhabhaal karane vaala hai
